November 25, 2021 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic Welcome to this month‚Äôs Digital Marketing Intelligence update. ü¶É ‚ÄòTis the season for fresh features. As marketers everywhere are wrapping up their seasonal campaigns, Similarweb is gifting you a new way to discover and share those all-important campaign insights: Get ready to go viral with the all-new Insight Sharing feature Always land on results with our Insight Suggestion tool Check out our new PPC functions walkthrough video Read on then go play! Get ready to go viral: insight sharing Now you can share the incredible insights you unearth on Similarweb ‚Äì straight from the platform. Finally. No more downloading or screen-grabbing, just select the channel you want to share across ‚Äì and boom! Your digital insights are on social media for the world to marvel at. Share your insights Fill in the blanks: automated insight suggestions How frustrating is that ‚ÄúWe couldn‚Äôt find any results‚Äù screen when you‚Äôre after insights? Hopefully a little less now. Next time you are caught short, you‚Äôll receive suggested countries or similar domains from the same industry where there are definitely results to explore. Check it out Easy PPC: paid search tools overview Looking to optimize your PPC strategy and learn what‚Äôs working (and what‚Äôs not) for your competitors‚Äô campaigns? Then check out this video, covering everything from understanding aggregate paid traffic, to PPC spend, to bounce rate and more. You‚Äôll be creating better-paid campaigns before you know it. Your amazing feedback helps us prioritize which features to develop next. Have any thoughts on our latest updates or features you‚Äôd like to see? Get in touch via our Live Chat, Social, or through your Account Manager. Thanks for reading. See you next month. by Owen Badham Senior Product Marketing Manager at Similarweb A product marketer with 10+ years in SaaS, specializing in product launches, GTM strategy, and collateral production.
